about_the_game:
The king's uncle is trying to usurp the kingdom and overtake the crown. With help of a powerful witch and her dark magic, few can thwart his plans.

But a group of brave friends have gathered to defy him and protect the kingdom. Join them in this fun time management strategy game; build, explore, gather, produce, trade, clear roads and meet magical creatures of the forest.

Build your own towns and settlements, upgrade the production, manage your food, resources and luxuries, trade, craft and take care of your people.

You can play in Relaxed, Normal or Extreme mode, each giving you the chance to win different medals and achievements along the way.

Try this in gorgeous colorful time management strategy city builder game now and put your strategic skills to the test.

  • JOIN a group of brave and determined heroes on their adventure

  • MASTER DOZENS of exciting levels

  • WIN various medals and get achievements

  • BUILD, upgrade, trade, collect, clear the road, explore and much more...

  • 3 DIFFICULTY MODES; pick your mode and enjoy: Casual, Normal and Extreme; each with unique challenges, bonuses and achievements

  • DISCOVER and USE POWER-UPS that will help you achieve your goals

  • FIND hidden treasures, food, tools and more, and use them to benefit your city

  • BEAUTIFUL 4K high-definition graphics and animations

  • COLLECTOR'S EDITION includes: 20 bonus levels and additional achievements
